name: Sala - White Scales
text: If this card is Normal Summoned: Discard 1 card; Special Summon 1 "Sala -" Monster from your GY.
pendulum_text: If "Sala - Black Scales" is in your other Pendulum Zone: You can destroy both this card and the other card in your Pendulum Zone, Special Summon 1 level 5 or lower "Sala -" Monster from your hand.
